name: Rotsen Furniture
tag_list: custom-furniture, live-edge-furniture, wood, architecture, design, interiors, interior-design
overview: Rotsen Furniture offers high quality, handmade furniture, that are custom made to clients’ specifications. Furniture made with large reclaimed wood slabs are designed and handcrafted for commercial and residential projects worldwide. Rotsen offers a large collection of live edge wood furniture that includes solid wood dining tables, coffee tables, consoles, desks and various home furnishing items. Dedicated to making the world more beautiful and comfortable, Rotsen Furniture, a U.S. company, designs pieces integrating woodâ€™s organic characteristics with a clean, graceful, modernist aesthetic. Custom pieces are often made according to specifications to satisfy definite interior design needs. Clients include the Four Seasons, Mandarin Oriental, Hyatt and W Hotels, as well as renowned interior design firms. Furniture has been created for both residential and corporate properties in the U.S. and throughout the world including Mexico, Canada, the Middle East, Europe and Africa. A U.S. company, Rotsen produces its furniture at facilities in the U.S. and Brazil aiding in the generation of employment to help strengthen local economies and communities. Custom and one-of-a-kind heirloom-quality furniture is created with wood originating in Brazil, Costa Rica and California and farms endorsed by the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC), for design savvy individuals, high-end hotels and renowned interior design firms. Committed to environmental preservation, the wood comes from sustainable and renewable sources as well as utilizing reclaimed and recycled materials with unique features. Combined with the additional elements of metal, glass, and plexiglass, the result is impressive, holistic pieces of exquisite craftsmanship.
